titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the application of the alternative minimum tax to the transfer of stock pursuant to an incentive stock option.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/20/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions providing for the application of the alternative minimum tax to stock transferred pursuant to an incentive stock option.
